Hi: Enable Opacity Brightness and Saturation plugin in ccsm
1) Open ccsm 2) Navigate to the Accessibility category 3) Enable Opacity Brightness and Saturation
I cannot explain it more clearly than I already have
1) Open ccsm 2) Navigate to the Accessibility category 3) Enable Opacity Brightness and Saturation
Now Alt+Scroll should work if you have compiz running
In sys>prefs>Appearance>Visual Effects, set it to something other than None
In sys>prefs>Appearance>Visual Effects, set it to Extra
If you set it to Extra, and enabled OBS plugin, Alt+Scroll down should make windows transparent
What is the output from your terminal:  ps ax|grep compiz.real|grep -v grep
Thats probably Opacify plugin doing that, is Opacify enabled?
